FuncDef: The display mpls lsp protocol ldp command displays information about LDP LSPs.
CLIs: display mpls lsp protocol ldp [ include <ip-address> <mask-length> ] [ outgoing-interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ] [ nexthop <nexthop> ] [ lsr-role { ingress | transit | egress } ] [ in-label <in-label-value> ]

display mpls lsp protocol ldp [ include <ip-address> <mask-length> ] [ outgoing-interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ] [ nexthop <nexthop> ] [ lsr-role { ingress | transit | egress } ] [ in-label <in-label-value> ] verbose

display mpls lsp compatible protocol ldp [ include <ip-address> <mask-length> ] [ outgoing-interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ] [ nexthop <nexthop> ] [ lsr-role { ingress | transit | egress } ]

display mpls lsp vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> protocol ldp [ include <ip-address> <mask-length> ] [ outgoing-interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ] [ nexthop <nexthop> ] [ lsr-role { ingress | transit | egress } ] [ in-label <in-label-value> ]

display mpls lsp vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> protocol ldp [ include <ip-address> <mask-length> ] [ outgoing-interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ] [ nexthop <nexthop> ] [ lsr-role { ingress | transit | egress } ] [ in-label <in-label-value> ] verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about LSPs that are mapped to a specified FEC.
-

Displays information about LSPs with a specified destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask length of an IP address.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Displays information about all LSPs with a specified outbound interface.
-

Displays information about all LSPs with a specified next hop.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about all LSPs on the current LSR that plays a specified role.
-

Displays information about all LSPs on the current LSR that functions as the ingress.
-

Displays information about all LSPs on the current LSR that functions as a transit node.
-

Displays information about all LSPs on the current LSR that functions as the egress.
-

Displays information about all LSPs with a specified incoming label.
The value ranges from 0 to 1048575.

Displays information about LSPs in compatible style.
-

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

Examples: Flag after Out IF: (I) - RLFA Iterated LSP, (I*) - Normal and RLFA Iterated LSP
Flag after LDP FRR: (L) - Logic FRR LSP
FEC                In/Out Label    In/Out IF                      Vrf Name
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If no parameter is configured, the display mpls lsp command displays information about all LDP LSPs.
